subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
Television
lead_paragraph: With two weeks of sluggish games already played, a question that strikes at the core of the N.F.L.’s appeal is being raised: Are the replacement officials diminishing the entertainment value?
snippet: With two weeks of sluggish games already played, a question that strikes at the core of the N.F.L.’s appeal is being raised: Are the replacement officials diminishing the entertainment value?
